remarks: Intersection in terms of class difference and union (De Morgan's law). Similar to Exercise 4.10(n) of [Mendelson] p. 231.  This would be an equality, rather than subset, in classical logic.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 25-Jul-2018.)
